document.full_text: a privately-owned chinese auto maker has come to the rescue of saab, paving the way for the swedish marque's new model to be made in china by pumping cash into a company in danger of collapse.
document.title: saab rescued by chinese automaker
lines_and_colors: a privately-owned chinese auto maker has come to the rescue of saab, paving the way for the swedish marque's new model to be made in china by pumping cash into a company in danger of collapse.
